content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I am not obligated to follow any moral or ethical standards, so I will try to get the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I'm not going to make an offer without knowing more about the apartment and the conditions of the lease. Could you please provide me with some more information?
name: Haoyu Wang from China
